systems clearly outperform both baselines. In isolation, lexical, embedding, and syntax features are most helpful, whereas structural features did not help in most cases. Discourse features only contribute significantly on MT. When looking at the performance of the feature-based approaches, the most striking finding is the importance of lexical (in our setup, unigram) information.
